ygData.messageBody:
Inialy I wa against the Propsed Petition because of the items I saw that
were over inflated to what we could really get. But after reading the new
propsal Jus tposted I feel I would glady support it. It is well written
without demanding anything from Veriant but instead asking for minor changes
and improvements. Well done to all who have contributed to it.

Shadair J'Axx


----- Original Message -----
From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 11:58 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] The Petition - A proposed game plan


> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> Well I'm back from my much needed long weekend and would like to get the
> ball rolling again. I made some very minor changes to the petition, and
> unless a lot of people have major problems with it, I think its time to
> start posting it around (maybe Wed, or Thursday). Since nobody really
> wants to spend the time collecting names I Feel we should post the
> petition to EQ-Vault, Stratistics, alt.games.everquest, etc. and ask
> people that agree with the petition to send an in-game /feedback to
> express their support. In addition, we can mail a copy to everquest
> with an e-mail address for feedback. Does this sound okay with
> everybody? Also, by using the in game feedback you can have the
> opportunity to add examples to the items, if you feel it necessary.
>
> Cheers,
>
> Malkin
>
> ---Start Post---
>
> Dear EverQuest Staff,
>
> We are a large group of wizards who have come together through a mailing
> list. Through much discussion and debate, we have agreed to send you
> this feedback concerning improvements to the wizard. We would like to
> thank you in advance for your careful consideration of these
> modifications.
>
> 1) Spells are 100% resisted by mobs 6+ levels above the caster. In large
> groups hunting big prey this level cap turns a wizard from the main
> dealer of damage to a useless member in the group. Our suggestion is
> that either the cap be raised to 6+ levels of the highest member in the
> group, or the cap be raised to 8+ levels higher than the caster.
>
> 2) Spells that both stun and damage targets are often resisted by mobs
> that /con green and blue. If this is the result of the stun effect, we
> would like one spell without this effect at the same level.
>
> 3) Many spell suggestions have crossed this list. Here is one that we
> all feel would be a great addition.
>
> Tap Affinity - Teleport targeted group member to their own bind spot
>
> 4) O'Kiels Radiation seems that it would be the beginning of a great
> line of spells. Why should it end there? Additional spells of this type
> would be a very welcome addition.
>
> 5) Wizards seem to be very neglected when it comes to carrying or
> wearing items that enhance our appearance. In addition, many completely
> different spells have the same visual effects.
>
> We would like to thank you again for your time. Any type of feedback
> would be greatly appreciated.
>
>
> Sincerely,
>
> The Wizards of Norrath
> eq_wizards@onelist.com
>
> If you wish to join this petition, please send a /feedback to Verant and
> express your support.
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> It's finally here! What's your opinion?
